Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The Stitch is centrally located and just three minutes from the I-40 interchange for the diverse workforce that comes from all over the Triangle. Its central location makes The Stitch a short drive from all points in the Triangle and just minutes from RDU International Airport.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Stitch is a modern office experience designed for today’s businesses. The property’s linear public space that links both courtyards and tenant spaces, wellness amenities, updated glass lines, and a 250,000 SF floor plate will maximize efficiency, employee happiness, and productivity.

4 Copley Parkway is a single-story office building in the heart of the RTP/RDU 
submarket. It is located off Airport Boulevard at I-40 with convenient access to RDU
International Airport, Research Triangle Park and Brier Creek, offering tenants quick accessibility to numerous amenities.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Building is located in prestigious Imperial Center Corporate Park at the edge of 
Research Triangle Park. The park has over 4 million square feet of office, research & development, retail and industrial space spread across over 450 acres.

Berrington Center is located off the I-540 and S Miami Boulevard interchange. The 
single-story office building is part of Imperial Center Business Park, a 450+ acre
master planned mixed-use development on the southeast edge of Research Triangle Park. The park is minutes from I-540 and RDU International Airport. Imperial Center has walking trails throughout, with various restaurant, bank and hotel options available to tenants.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: New! First Floor Tenant Amenity Center
